attributes.additional_details: Make it easier for people to contact the gp
attributes.background: Scrap the early morning daily booking system and offer more precooked appointments

rejection.details:
Decisions relating to GP appointments, including whether to make these available to book, are operational matters for the NHS and individual GPs, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Give patients a right to be seen by an NHS GP or dentist within three days: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640653
